TopicTitle: [1.0.4] ACP-v7 - Atmo, Auroras, Stratus/Cirrus clouds, Lightning, Dust storms, Bioluminescence

Articles.Content: Hey Joe, Any chance of adding Lightning like the old AVP v2 pack? I'm going to fiddle with this when I get home. Really like the double layer cloud setup, But I love the lightning and aurora from AVP. I see some cfg bashing in my immediate future.

> 
> I see alot of mods that are on the first page all the time.

Only the super popular mods stay afloat. I've had my other mods sink on the main page so I find it's usually safer to have them here. I might post it there later though.
